title: Mexican lamb wraps with guacamole
time: Hands-on time 30 min, frying time 10 min
description: Smoked paprika adds a taste of Mexico to this quick and easy lamb recipe.
ingredients: small bunch of chopped fresh coriander

method.Step 1: Put a large frying pan over a medium-high heat and add the olive oil, red onion and cumin. Gently fry for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, then add the chunks of lamb leg, paprika, the lime juice and garlic. Cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or so until the lamb is cooked but still a bit pink inside. Set aside to rest while you make the guacamole.

method.Step 2: Mash the avocados with the red onion, lime juice and coriander. Taste and season, then serve with the lamb, warm tortillas and dollops of soured cream.
